<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Structure describing a contiguous range of call-sites which reside</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// in the same procedure fragment. With -fbasic-block-sections, there will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// be one call site range per basic block section. Otherwise, we will have</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// one call site range containing all the call sites in the function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the actions table and gather the first action index for each</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// landing pad site.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a093b0a333833131b3fb12fb62f915bf1">computeActionsTable</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;const LandingPadInfo &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;LandingPads,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ActionEntry&gt;</a> &amp;Actions,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> &amp;FirstActions);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a1f1ea57bc156f9e309b4049bc1d10e17">computePadMap</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;const LandingPadInfo &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;LandingPads,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a8263fed2d1a8589d4124ec53fdc8f26b">RangeMapType</a> &amp;PadMap);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the call-site table and the call-site ranges. The entry for an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// invoke has a try-range containing the call, a non-zero landing pad and an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// appropriate action. The entry for an ordinary call has a try-range</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// containing the call and zero for the landing pad and the action.  Calls</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// marked &#39;nounwind&#39; have no entry and must not be contained in the try-range</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// of any entry - they form gaps in the table.  Entries must be ordered by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// try-range address. CallSiteRanges vector is only populated for Itanium</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// exception handling.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a49694eb08442bb35020b9d8dfad6d7e5">computeCallSiteTable</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;CallSiteEntry&gt;</a> &amp;CallSites,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;CallSiteRange&gt;</a> &amp;CallSiteRanges,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;const LandingPadInfo &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;LandingPads,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> &amp;FirstActions);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Emit landing pads and actions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The general organization of the table is complex, but the basic concepts</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// are easy.  First there is a header which describes the location and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// organization of the three components that follow.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  1 The landing pad site information describes the range of code covered</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     by the try.  In our case it&#39;s an accumulation of the ranges covered</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     by the invokes in the try.  There is also a reference to the landing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     pad that handles the exception once processed.  Finally an index into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     the actions table.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  2 The action table, in our case, is composed of pairs of type ids</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     and next action offset.  Starting with the action index from the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     landing pad site, each type Id is checked for a match to the current</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     exception.  If it matches then the exception and type id are passed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     on to the landing pad.  Otherwise the next action is looked up.  This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     chain is terminated with a next action of zero.  If no type id is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     found the frame is unwound and handling continues.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  3 Type id table contains references to all the C++ typeinfo for all</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     catches in the function.  This tables is reversed indexed base 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns the starting symbol of an exception table.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a420cc4a7a63b33a52659768b133b5f1b">emitExceptionTable</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a0693fd10cd699cd25acfe38350e47577">emitTypeInfos</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TTypeEncoding, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;TTBaseLabel);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Helpers for identifying what kind of clause an EH typeid or selector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// corresponds to. Negative selectors are for filter clauses, the zero</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// selector is for cleanups, and positive selectors are for catch clauses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a53e615f9a2ef0dec49685674e388c6d2"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a53e615f9a2ef0dec49685674e388c6d2">isFilterEHSelector</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Selector) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Selector &lt; 0; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a588e43cc9f4e6e19f0b10e9e65518f01"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a588e43cc9f4e6e19f0b10e9e65518f01">isCleanupEHSelector</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Selector) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Selector == 0; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a6de56377798490410db5d499f851ffcc"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a6de56377798490410db5d499f851ffcc">isCatchEHSelector</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Selector) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Selector &gt; 0; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
